name: cow
content:
cow noun
(ANIMAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 [ C ] a large female farm animal kept to produce meat and milk: a dairy cow Most of these ranchers own only own a bull and about twenty cows. Compare
bull
Robert Llewellyn/Corbis/GettyImages
a female or male bovine (= an animal from the cattle group): There has been a lot of research into disease in farm animals such as cows, pigs, and chickens.
[ C ] the adult female of a large mammal such as an elephant, a whale, or a seal: a cow elephant Compare
bull
More examplesFewer examplesWe watched the cow suckling her calves.The farmer called the vet out to treat a sick cow.The cows were grazing in the meadow.We visited a dairy farm and saw the cows being milked.A cow goes "moo" and a dog goes "bow-wow".This large elk herd numbers about 1,400 bulls, cows, and calves.
